games.name: Assassins Creed: Valhalla (PS4)
games.description: Assassin's Creed Valhalla is an action-adventure video game developed by Ubisoft Montreal and published by Ubisoft.

games.name: Elden Ring (PS4)
games.description: Elden Ring is an action role-playing game developed by FromSoftware and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment.

games.name: Soma (PS4)
games.description: Soma is a survival horror video game developed by Frictional Games and published by 505 Games. It was released for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One in September 2015.

games.name: Horizon Forbidden West (PS5)
games.description: Horizon Forbidden West is an action role-playing video game developed by Guerrilla Games and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment.

games.name: Ghost of Tsushima (PS4)
games.description: Ghost of Tsushima is an action-adventure game developed by Sucker Punch Productions and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment.

games.name: Marvel's Spider-Man (PS4)
games.description: Marvel's Spider-Man is an action-adventure game developed by Insomniac Games and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment.

games.name: God of War (PS4)
games.description: God of War is an action-adventure game developed by Santa Monica Studio and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment.

games.name: The Last of Us Part II (PS4)
games.description: The Last of Us Part II is an action-adventure survival horror game developed by Naughty Dog and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment.

games.name: Bloodborne (PS4)
games.description: A challenging action RPG set in a Lovecraftian world.

games.name: Days Gone (PS4)
games.description: A post-apocalyptic open-world action-adventure game.

games.name: Control (PS4)
games.description: A third-person action-adventure game set in a mysterious government agency.

games.name: Disco Elysium (PS4)
games.description: A role-playing game set in a dystopian city.

games.name: The Outer Worlds (PS4)
games.description: A role-playing game set in a space colony.

games.name: Death Stranding (PS4)
games.description: A post-apocalyptic action-adventure game.

games.name: Returnal (PS5)
games.description: A roguelike action-adventure game.

games.name: Ghostrunner (PS4)
games.description: A cyberpunk action-adventure game.

games.name: Kena: Bridge of Spirits (PS4)
games.description: A 3D action-adventure game.

games.name: Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart (PS5)
games.description: A platform game set in the Ratchet & Clank series.

games.name: Spider-Man: Miles Morales (PS5)
games.description: A spin-off game of Marvel's Spider-Man.

games.name: Concrete Genie (PS4)
games.description: A 3D action-adventure game where you paint the city to bring to life a cast of colorful genies.

games.name: Star Wars Jedi: Survivor (PS5)
games.description: The story of Cal Kestis continues in Star Wars Jedi: Survivor™, a third-person, galaxy-spanning, action-adventure game from Respawn Entertainment, developed in collaboration with Lucasfilm Games.

books.name: Star Wars Jedi: Survivor (PC)
books.description: The story of Cal Kestis continues in Star Wars Jedi: Survivor™, a third-person, galaxy-spanning, action-adventure game from Respawn Entertainment, developed in collaboration with Lucasfilm Games.

books.name: Star Wars Jedi: Survivor (PC)
books.description: The story of Cal Kestis continues in Star Wars Jedi: Survivor™, a third-person, galaxy-spanning, action-adventure game from Respawn Entertainment, developed in collaboration with Lucasfilm Games.
